text: it's yet another chilling detail to come
out of this disaster new evidence that
the copilot practiced his fatal dive
that killed a hundred and fifty people
on this mountainside it happened on a
flight from Germany to Spain earlier the
same day and this is the man who was at
the controls andreas Lubitz
left alone in the cockpit he spent
around five minutes playing with the
computer asked to descend by air traffic
control he would have turned a dial just
like this one
today's report says he put in extreme
Heights from as low as a hundred feet to
as high as forty nine thousand feet he
did something similar on the plane that
he crashed but just turning this dial
wouldn't lead to dramatic changes on
board the captain and passengers in the
back wouldn't have noticed any
difference investigators have now built
a picture of what happened onboard the
Germanwings flight this is the actual
plane filmed earlier this year a copilot
with mental health problems locked his
captain out of the cockpit and
deliberately flew into the side of a
mountain but the agony goes on for the
families of those on board they know
what andreas Lubitz did but they may
never know why richard Wescott BBC news
